item.title: About Eija-Leena
item.description: Interested in: statistics, open data, data analysis, visualisation, Big Data, Data Science trends, modelling, R, freelance, and most importantly: making a difference. Thanks for reading! Drop me a mail eijaleena@eijaleenakoponen.fi
